scenario_text.value: So...do you think those little guys are okay?
You mean the monsters from earlier?

I hope they weren’t hurt too badly when Kaito
and Minoru attacked them.

And I’m worried about that awful queen they
seemed so scared of...

(Aoi’s got plenty of her own problems right
now, but she’s worried about those monsters.)
(She really is very kind.)

(Then again, she did say she thought they
were cute. Maybe she just likes cute things?)
Uh... Takuma? Is something wrong?
No, not really...
(Should I tell her what I was just thinking?)
You sure are nice.
You love cute stuff.
Save your concern.

I was just thinking how kind of you it is to
be so worried about them.
You sure are nice.
Really?
(Huh? Why does she seem upset?)

You think I’m worried about them because...
I’m just nice?

I mean, I think you’re the nicest person
here.
Oh... Okay.
(Did I say something wrong?)

I was just thinking that you sure must love
cute stuff.
Wh-what makes you say that?
(Her whole face is turning bright red!)

Well, uh, you said yourself you thought those
little guys were cute before...

Then when you got so anxious about them, I
figured it was because you liked cute things.

Oh, I’m sorry. I shouldn’t have let that
slip...

Hey, you don’t have to apologize! Besides,
those things were really cute.

And I don’t see what you have to hide. What’s
wrong with liking cute things?

You...you don’t think it makes me seem
frivolous?
Not at all.
Really? That’s great! Thanks, Takuma.

I was just thinking you should save your
concern for us rather than those things.

They may not have turned out to be a serious
threat, but there may still be one out there.

Especially considering what they said about
that queen.

Yes, you’re right. I’m sorry. I don’t know
what I was saying just now.

But...this is no time for us to be chatting,
is it?

We need to track down some clues that will
help us find Miu fast.

Let’s go track down some clues that will help
us find Miu fast.
